summary: The President of the Bundestag  is the person that is in charge of the meetings of the Bundestag, the parliament of Germany, whos duties is similar to a speaker.
full_text: The President of the Bundestag  presides over the sessions of the Bundestag, the parliament of Germany, with functions similar to that of a speaker in other countries. In the German order of precedence, his office is ranked second after the President and before the Chancellor. The current President of the Bundestag is Norbert Lammert, since October 18, 2005.
title: President of the Bundestag
